title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.12 - Information sources
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.12 - Information sources

State Regulations

Superintendents of correctional facilities may at times have
responsibility for release of information and response to inquiries from news
media representatives pertaining to their respective facilities at the
direction of the office of public information. Information pertaining to
overall departmental operations, policies, procedures, etc., will be released
or responded to through the office of public information in Albany, New

York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
51.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
